doc.title: M! Mom, Madonna & Me
doc.plot: Part autobiography, part performance piece and part homage to Madonna. Exploring cultural identity, sexuality and the maternal relationship. Siddiqi chronicles his life thus far: from a teenager in Pakistan channeling Madonna and enraging fundamentalists by posing as a woman in a fashion magazine to a fashion designer in L.A. and finally his contemporary manifestation as a self-styled provocateur in Montr√©al.
